page.title: 07Life Styles TV-Recreation.
page.content: Watching TV is a popular hobby among children. We found that the type of programme most popular were those shown on childrens TV, such as " Inspector Gadget".Series imported from America such as "A-Team" were very popular. Sport was a favourite amongst boys, but few girls watched it.Comedy shows and soap operas such as "Eastenders"were watched by both boys and girls.Chat shows such as "Wogan" were only moderatly popular. Few children watched news or current affairs. Not many were interested in nature series or drama. Nearly half the people interviewed had a home video and the most popular viewing was home recorded programmes. May people borrowed tapes from video hire shops.
